summary: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.
cast: Seung-Hyun Choi|Se-Kyung Shin|Yoon-seok Kim|Hae-Jin Yoo|Lee Hanee|Do-won Kwak|Kyeong-yeong Lee|In-kwon Kim|Oh Jeong-Se|Hyo-ju Park|Su-hee Go|Jin-gu Yeo|Jin-Woong Bae|Jong-ryol Choi|Kap-Soo Han|Kim Joo-Heon|Chul-Moo Kim|Dong-hwi Lee|Sung-Wook Lee|Hee-Jung So|Myung-hun Yang|Sung-Woo Yang
title: Tajja: Sineui son
